sources.title: The Street Fighter (MARTIAL ARTS ACTION FILM in German, Crime Thriller Films, Full Films)

metadata.Plot: Terry is a tough, mercenary, master of martial arts. When an important business magnate dies, leaving billions to his daughter, the Mafia and Yakuza try to hire Terry to kidnap the daughter. When they refuse to meet his exorbitant price, then try to kill him to conceal their secret plans, he promptly offers his services to protect her. Much ultra-violent martial-arts fighting action, as expected, ensues. This also includes a subplot of a family's bloodfeud with Terry over a disputed debt.
metadata.Writer: KÃ´ji Takada, Motohiro Torii, Steve Autrey
metadata.Actors: Shin'ichi Chiba, Goichi Yamada, Yutaka Nakajima
